caption: Oh hello Billy and Molly!!!! Our wee / pidree story of the friendship between my dear friend Billy and a wild otter he named Molly, is screening at @dceff_org on March 24th. For those attending @xposurexpf next week, i'll be on the main stage talking about emotion in photography. It's a subject i've become obsessed with over the years and one I love to talk about. Hope to see you there!
